com.feedzai.commons.sql.abstraction.engine.configuration

Class PdbProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      • java.util.Hashtable<Object,Object>
        • java.util.Properties
          • com.feedzai.commons.sql.abstraction.engine.configuration.PdbProperties
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Map<Object,Object>

    public class PdbProperties
extends Properties
implements Cloneable<PdbProperties>
    Represents the possible properties to include when configuring the engine.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Rui Vilao (rui.vilao@feedzai.com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        properties - The properties to merge.
        useDefaults - true if default properties are to be set, false otherwise.
